structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.catch_line: Employees' application form not to require disclosure of religious affiliation.
law.text: No application form for certified or classified employees used by any school district shall contain any block or question that would require the applicant to disclose his religious affiliation.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 480, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 1.
